website_summaries.verdict: This natural cleanser is the perfect combination of gentle on the skin, and strong on rosacea symptoms.
pros: This mild cleanser will leave skin feeling soft and clean
The product has a pleasant scent and never dries out skin
You will notice a reduction in redness within the first week or 2
The product is cruelty free and packed with natural ingredients
It also works as a makeup remover – taking off waterproof mascara with ease
cons: The bottle is made from hard plastic, which makes squeezing product out difficult

website_summaries.verdict: This is a powerful natural cleanser that contains ingredients that do a stellar job fighting acne and soothing skin.
pros: This cleanser contains tea tree oil, which is powerful in fighting acne and breakouts
Cleanser is effective in removing makeup
Cool and refreshing feeling is delivered when washing face
Mild enough to use on sensitive skin
cons: It can be difficult to squeeze cleanser out of bottle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product, Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: For a person with sensitive skin, I love this facial cleanser. It has a mild scent, so nothing to strong. Once pair with water, it creates a wonderful lather and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Provided proper PH balance for my skin
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Provided proper PH balance for my skin. Left my face bright and tight after each wash. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Baker

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! I love that their ingredients are so good for your skin. They smell good and feel absolutely luxurious. I seriously have made my friends try it on their hands or face when they come to visit. This cleanser is wonderful. I use Tea Tree Oil for my breakouts, so to have a cleanser with Tea Tree Oil just makes it even easier to use the oil on my whole face! Now I just use the essential oil on just the breakouts. This cleanser is great for my face but could be used on the whole body as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kahri E. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Acne control but doesn't remove makeup
customer_reviews.text: I think this cleanser is helping keep my breakouts down, since using it along with a toner I get small pimples but no big breakouts like before. Now my only problem is that it doesn't remove makeup well so I'll be grabbing a makeup remover (been using coconut oil). Now weird thing is that my eyes have seemed puffy since using it but that might not be related to the face wash so I won't say forsure that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for my daughter's acne. It also doesn't turn the towels white. It's a bit expensive, but we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tech User

customer_reviews.title: Product changed
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product about 5 times. I have acne prone, sensitive skin and this kept my face clear and feeling fresh. The last purchase I received of this item had a different shaped bottle and a different smell. It has a strong ivory soap smell now. After using this new purchase, my face broke-out severely within the first week. I haven't had a breakout like this in over a year, and nothing else has changed except this new bottle I began using. Also just FYI there is no organic certification for this product that claims to be organic.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this face wash. I have been using it every day for at least a month now. I have sensitive skin and will sometimes get some blemishes and this face wash has been so gentle on my skin, but leaves it clean feeling and has helped me not get as many breakouts. My face doesn’t feel dry after using it and doesn’t feel oily, either. It really just a perfect feeling after using it. Lightly scented, so it’s not a tea tree strong minty scent, but just a nice and mild scent. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Irizarri

customer_reviews.title: Great product, horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the soap and how it cleans my face, as I have acne prone/oily skin. Problem is I’m not sure if the formula changed but the smell is HORRIBLE! I’ve added tea tree oil just to cut down on the smell and it’s still rather strong. Again, it does what it needs to do but I don’t know how much longer I can stomach the smell.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed....
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this face wash three times previously and I have LOVED it, most recently was in October 2018. When I placed my order on June 30th 2019 - the product I received was not the same. I actually returned it thinking it was defective. But when the replacement arrived 7/6/19 I found it has the same problems. The product is very runny and does not smell right. More like dirt than tea tree oil. Super disappointed because the kind I'd ordered many times before was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: indykad

customer_reviews.title: Smells Terribel
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first 2 bottles I ordered!! They smelled so good and really worked for my acne. Apparently the formula changed!! I thought I got a bad batch or maybe it got too hot in shipping so I returned it only to have the exact same product again. The first bottles we great. You could smell the tea tree but this formula literally makes me want to gag, it smells awful!!!! Please bring back the old formula!!
customer_reviews.author: bgodfrey

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula, not as good.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because they changed the formula. It’s so watered down. I would recommend this to all my coworkers and friends, And when one of them bought it, it was so disappointing to see that the formula and even the container had changed. The container is cheaper. I hope they go back to their original formula.
customer_reviews.author: Francesko H

customer_reviews.title: Different formula
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve ordered this product. First time I absolutely loved it. It smelled great and made my skin look awesome. Second time, the formula has apparently changed. It’s runny and smells bad, and doesn’t smell like there’s any tea tree oil in it at all. I used to recommend this product to everyone, but very disappointed this time around. Whatever they changed, I suggest they change it back
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hancock

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot so far!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using for 3 days but it has made a difference!! I struggle with rosacea. I get a rash on my face with little bumps and this has really really reduced them and the appearance of a rash!! I am so happy! Hopefully it stays this way!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the 3rd or 4th time I've bought tho product. It helps with my acne and doesn't upset my dry, sensitive skin. I love it. I did notice this new batch doesn't have a nice scent like the others have. It has a kind of unpleasant smell to it but I guess you are washing it off of your face so that shouldn't matter very much.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Popovici

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: Everybody raved about this product in the reviews. Some even said it only took 3 days until they seen an improvement in their skin. As for me? I waited a good 2-3 weeks until I would make a review. I used this product twice a day in that amount of time. My final thoughts on this product was meh. It doesn't really do anything for me. I do like that its natural and organic but it didnt make a significant difference to my skin. Not going to buy again :/
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell last two bottles
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product multiple times but the last two orders have had a bad smell. I don’t know if they changed the formula or these orders came from the same bad batch but super disappointed as I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New formula. Not good
customer_reviews.text: Formula has changed. Smells awful. Does not lather. Disappointing since I have purchased this twice in the past and really liked it before the formula changed. Unfortunately the smell is so bad I will have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: Initially got his for my partner who has pretty bad cystic acne. They never really use it but, I started using it and I really like it! I use it by itself if I'm feeling a little dry (I have combination skin) or with my usual face wash when I'm feeling oily/having breakouts. I also love to use this with my generic clarisonic face washer. It definitely seems to help with acne/redness and doesn't make my skin overly oily.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I have oily sensitive skin with some dryness and a lot of redness. Used it twice, seems fine. Didnt hurt at all, no stinging. However, this stuff reeks. I cant figure put which ingredient it is because their tea tree moisturizer does not smell this bad (its not great but not offensive). The cleanser smells like strong plastic with a hint of onion, and something else I can't place, but its something nasty. I would skip this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over a year and loved it, it helped clear up my cystic acne.....until now! I bought two bottles and opened a new one and it smells horrible so I figured I would check the second bottle and that one smells horrible as well. I loved this product but they have changed something in it and it is awful. It's not a smell I can just ignore and I cant hold my breath long enough to get my face washed.....time to look for something new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fine, not amazing
customer_reviews.text: There were a few things I liked and didn't like. It has a nice soothing scent, and is gentle on the skin. I don't have too many complaints about the face wash, considering many face washes react badly on my skin but this one does just fine. While using it, I have not noticed an increase in acne or decrease. I feel as if I get a fairly normal amount, so its not a miracle product for me or anything. I do have rosacea in my nose and cheeks, and do not see a noticeable difference from using this. I would recommend as a basic face wash, not holy grail or anything though.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kahle

customer_reviews.title: Best skincare company. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: My skin absolutely loves this. I have sensitive skin and it’s always red and discolored. But after switching to this, I have a more even complexion. I’ve tried everything from drugstore brands like neutrogena, to high end brands like clarins and Peter Thomas Roth... I haven’t had much success until I researched something all natural and found this brand. I’ve loved every product I have tried from era-organics... and my skin really does too.
customer_reviews.author: BAG

customer_reviews.title: Product and quality had changed
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this cleanser. I’ve used it since 2018 and had no issues, loved the smell and feel on my skin after a wash. My recent order though it seemed like a possible counterfeit and the the substance was more watery than previous orders. I wonder if the quality had changed which has made me weary about purchasing their item anymore..
customer_reviews.author: Rizza Ray

customer_reviews.title: Neutral smell, good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: It is an effective cleanser with very safe natural ingredients. It does not have any tea tree smell. I like the smell of tea tree so I wish it did. You can feel it working as you let it set on your face after massaging it in. It does help with smoother and softer skin. I personally have found it worth the time and price for my summer skin issues. My teenage daughter is using it too and likes it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Changed for the worse
customer_reviews.text: Agree with other reviews. The first bottle I got was perfect and smelled nice. This second bottle I got is watery and smells bad.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Devastating purchase from this company
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product in the past and have loved it. Unfortunately, this time there is something wrong with the two bottles I ordered. It does not smell like tea tree at all and the product consistency is not the same. It left my face red, irritated, itchy and burning. This was heartbreaking.
customer_reviews.author: avid amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good 👍
customer_reviews.text: The Scent is Okay On This Product But it Did Work Really Good Makes Your Face Feel Super Clean & it Doesnt Irritate Sensitive Skin .. My Only Complaint is The Pricing Its Pretty Pricey Especially If Your Trying To Match it With The Cream .. Wish It Was Cheaper So I Probably Wont Buy Again Because Of The Prices But if You Dont Mind How Much You Spend it is A Great Product To Use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hold your breath
customer_reviews.text: The scent of the product is repulsive. It scent is similar to a drain cleaner. The product is thin and lathers easily. My face does feel clean and tight after use. If you can hold your and tolerate the smell it may useful for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: shizhen jia

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my teen by using it twice daily, acne is gone. As soon as she forgets to use it, acne is back. Gave it 4 stars because the smell is not as fresh as one would like but not terrible considering it's a more natural product.
customer_reviews.author: jill11

customer_reviews.title: been using it for about 15 days
customer_reviews.text: I use this 3 to 4 times a week to wash my face in the morning. Since using this for about 15 days now I have noticed amazingly clear skin. Also, I feel my skin has been getting softer.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Really helps oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: Always had oily skin and this takes the shine away and doesn't make my face generate a bunch of oil to rehydrate. Helps manage breakouts. I'm 52 with the adult acne...ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Dayton L.

customer_reviews.title: I use this to clean my piercings
customer_reviews.text: This is great for piercing aftercare (as long as you're not sensitive to tea tree oil. Do a spot test first, as with any new product.) I use this once a day in the shower to clean new piercings (double helix) and to keep older piercings healthy (lobe and nose). I was using Provon, but I find that it's irritating for sensitive skin (and also full of chemicals). If it's a new piercing, I also use H2Ocean and do tea tree oil and sea salt soaks. This is great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Change in quality
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this cleanser but the last two bottles I’ve received have been watery and smell weird (like plastic?). It’s a bummer because this was my favorite face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Actually, REALLY works
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior male. I have used Jack Black daily facial cleanser for years. While using it, I developed rosacea. I tried a few products that claimed to work, but this is the only one that actually did. Glad to have found it and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for! I would def reccoemnd to a friend with pily and acne prone skin like me♥️
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love! Been working great! My skin feels amazing and I have adored using it. I wish it had come with more directions on how it's best used but I have been using it twice a day (morning and before bed) with the matching exfoliating scrub and moisturizer. Been working great and my skin has never looked more glowing and felt so smooth! ❤️ I wouldn't say it smells great. It's walnut so it's not supposed to smell like perfume but it definitely doesn't smell bad and you don't smell it after you wash it off anyway. So good:)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Scent change?
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time purchasing this product. On my most recent purchase the scent of the product has changed and it is not a pleasant smell. Previous orders were also labeled differently but the ingredient list is the same. My daughter won’t use it. She loved the scant scent of tea tree oil the previous bottles left on her skin but this bottle smells more earthy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Formula is suddenly  watery
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this wash for over a year now. It like it and it works for me. But this last time i purchased it was super watery. It used to be thicker... makes me feel like they are watering the formula down. Will finish the bottle and buy another if that one turns watery i will stop buying.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Garcica

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It cleans well and leaves a good feeling on my skin. I have not been using it long enough to see if the tea tree part of it helps my complexion, but will update if I see changes. : )
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Anyway the entire bottle at $18 is useless. I wish I could return it for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried to compare this Tea Tree Oil against Trader Joe's version which is half the price. My son who has acne problems compared this Era Organics cream and said that it was irritating his face badly compared to the Trader Joe's which may be a weaker formula, I wouldn't know. Anyway the entire bottle at $18 is useless. I wish I could return it for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne N.

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple of years now and the 3rd time buying it, it was really watered down. I see no way to contact the seller. I have been very satisfied with the product until now. I don't know if it will change the product or why it is so watered down but I may not order again. Not sure if anyone else noticed the change in the product but I haven't ordered in a while because it lasts so long- I just ordered the one in August 2019 which is the one that was watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Walworth

customer_reviews.title: Customer service A+
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle on my skin. I am on my third bottle and I still love it. My recent bottle was watery and I had originally believed that the brand had the formula changed, however I contacted the eraorganics company and they said that the formula was not changed and that the item was defective. I contacted amazon and they shipped me a replacement and the formula was just how I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this face wash. I love the simple ingredients and the fact that it’s cruelty free. I love the smell as you can smell the Tea-tree in it. It lathers decent and feels refreshing on my skin. I’ve been using this for several days now and I feel like my skin is more vibrant although still quite oily.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: I guess *UPDATE*
customer_reviews.text: Idk if it's working a lot or not. Mom says my face isn't red in places anymore and it looks smoother but acne itself isn't improved but so much yet. Edit: After a couple weeks it contributed to my face breaking out worse. I used the corresponding moisturizer as well and that did most of the damage but this aided some as well.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin; did not help with rosacea or acne.
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is very smooth feeling, and cooling when you apply it. It is very gentle,and did not cause dryness on my face. I have been using it for about three weeks. I purchased this to help with acne and a rosacea. It did not really help either of the conditions. I was a bit disappointed, since I was hoping for some decrease in visible redness. I wouldn't buy it again, since it was pricier than other face washes I have used in the past (like Aveno for sensitive skin) and it didn't really help with my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aled

customer_reviews.title: I'll have to keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product along with the face face scrub and moisturizer. I've been using them for almost 2 months and no change in my skin at all. Very disappointed given that they were more expensive, and I cant return them because the 30 day period is up. I'm still on the hunt for a regimen that works for me to clear my skin.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Best natural ingredients!!! These people know their stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough wonderful things about this brand. I keep expanding the list on their products and have yet to be disappointed by anything. This face wash could be sold in a much smaller bottle bc just less then a pea size will do. Will last forever!!! I want all my products to be ERA Organics. Please come out with more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nolaorchid

customer_reviews.title: Only bought once and never again
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this cleanser. First, the smell is off putting. It’s like it went bad and soured. Second, this is certainly not for all skin types, just oily skin. My skin is normal and it kept getting dried out. My face was better off without using this. According to other comments, this product was good and changed. I wouldn’t know. I just know that this product in spring 2020 is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Xenia Beckstrom

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible and doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this face wash for about a month now and it does not help at all. My skin is still oily, acne isn't going away and it's bringing about cystic zits. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS
customer_reviews.author: ndukani

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions to the "T" n buy with moisturizer do a good combo
customer_reviews.text: Liked packaging of product...was received in New condition...bottle was sealed when I uncapped it...shook it gently to mix it. It has a thick consistency...applied as directed...on wet face...used a dime size, a lil goes a long way. Not a fan of tea tree oil but ended up liking it ..but it does has the distinct smell of tea tree but not too overpowering..face felt clean...bought with moisturizer and that was nice soothing...think I'll stay with this really cut the oil on my face without a drying effect
customer_reviews.author: Karolena

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it a lot to control his acne.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son for the second time. It helps a lot with stopping the acne on his face and back. I'm glad it has natural ingredients like tea tree oil in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie My Lady

customer_reviews.title: No tea tree oil scent this time
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product on 3 separate occasions within the last year. The most recent one I received a few weeks ago does not smell at all of tea tree oil so I question whether they changed the formula or so heavily reduced the amount of tea tree oil that it has no scent. It’s a very mild cleanser but I wish it had the tea tree oil in it because that’s why I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: EriLink

customer_reviews.title: Has coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this line of products and have used MANY of them - this cleanser is nice; smells only faintly of tea tree oil; and doesnt dry out much like other tea tree oil products. It does, however, contain coconut oil - which can clog pores but if you tolerate it well -- then by all means - buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Salma

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: No issues with shipping or product, just too soon to give a product description; I will update after a couple of weeks of use. I am Hopeful!!!
customer_reviews.author: lj

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from acne for years. I would have never washed my face with oil in the past, but after doing a lot of research I realized this product could actually improve my skin. My skin has improved dramatically with this product and the use of supplements (zinc, vitamin A, vitamin D & probiotics). I definitely plan on purchasing this product again :) I hope this review helps people suffering with acne.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Holasek

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR DRY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY IF TOU HAVE DRY SKIN. It is described for dry, oily skin. On bottle it says oily skin. My skin dryer now than before. Use o ly if you have pily skin or it will dry out out so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Crumb  Fun

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked everything from this company. I struggle with adult acne and still do but this cleanser definitely cleans my face properly without drying it out. Has a light smell. Good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Best company
customer_reviews.text: I use almost everything this company has and its so amazing! has helpe my skin so much! ALWAYS makes it smooth and clear
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with cystic acne and this product has made a tremendous difference!! I use all 3 products: the facial cleanser, toner and scrub and will never use anything else!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty West

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my Acne/Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many natural and prescription products for my acne prone skin. I was so hoping that this one would help. Unfortunately I have seen no difference at all after using it every day for two weeks. It may work for some but had no effect on my problem skin.
customer_reviews.author: onlinereader

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and fragrance free!
customer_reviews.text: Really gentle milk-like cleanser that works to a lather. I’m allergic to lavender scented products which unfortunately are very common in the acne prevention world. This face wash is free of added perfume and common allergens to cleanse the skin without issue. I’ve tried so many products that are much more expensive to no avail and then stumbled upon this gem. The only reason I haven’t given a 5 is because I would say my acne is very much controlled but I’m stil having small but regular breakout areas. I’m currently changing some other products and habits as well to hopefully affect this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hormonal Cystic Acne
customer_reviews.text: My face is so happy right now! After 3 days of using this along with their acne cream, my cystic acne has gone way down and I haven't had any new flare ups.
customer_reviews.author: MommyMary

customer_reviews.title: It works, but don’t expect full cure
customer_reviews.text: This face wash has definitely helped with my redness. I have awkward red patches on my cheeks. Has not cleared them up but has helped. I used with the company’s rosacea face cream and it’s a good combo. Does take a bit of rubbing to foam up so make sure you use for a full minute for best results. Definitely will keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly LeJeune

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter spent 20 minutes last night telling me how much she loves these products! This one does a wonderful job of removing her makeup, smells great, leaves her skin soft and is helping control her break-outs with the other products in the family. I highly recommend this product. Actually I can safely say I recommend every product i have ever bought from this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: D Dillard

customer_reviews.title: This product makes my skin feel so soft and smooth ...
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my skin feel so soft and smooth. I have acne at 28 and I've tried soooo many products to try and get rid of it. Granted, my skin isn't clear and I still get breakouts on occasion due to hormones and whatnot, but this product has cleared my skin significantly and I'm going to continue to promote this face cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this face wash. It does smell like tea tree oil, but that doesn’t both me at all. Seems to work great and helps keep my face clear.
customer_reviews.author: meljs

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and a great cleanser. Make sure a moisturizer is used after this. May dry out your skin slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Tevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. The safety tab was not secure and the product was watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Katniss

customer_reviews.title: Hormonal Cyst Acne
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is literally my holy grail. I get more of the hormonal cyst acne on my chin which if you suffer from cysts you know they are sooooo hard to deal with. This stuff will take the swelling down the very next day. If I can resist picking at them (lol) and just wash with this twice a day then it’ll be completely gone in 2-3 days which is a god send. I’ve only gone through about 1/4 of the bottle and I’ve had it for I think 4 months now. A little goes a LONG way. And it has a silky, smooth consistency and a clean tea tree like sent. I love this stuff so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that works
customer_reviews.text: I love this so far. It smells great- just like tea tree oil. It’s not too drying, but removes excess oil( I have very oily skin) and has taken care of stubborn acne for me. I got an email from the seller saying it might cause acne to get worse then better and I complete understand that since most face washes do that, but I didn’t notice that happen.
customer_reviews.author: Nychole

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING with clarisonic!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this face wash! Very nice and creamy consistency, works well as a normal wash but also AMAZING with the clarisonic Mia 2 - does not get foamy but spreads evenly. Makes your skin very soft and even after using it, I am now obsessed! Only word of caution is it has a strong tea tree smell, I like it but if you don't like tea tree oil this may be a bit strong for you.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Calmed down my acne
customer_reviews.text: Immediately calms my skin down. I used Kheil's which caused my skin to breakout every day, once I used this, I noticed results in a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after awhile
customer_reviews.text: the smell isn't as bad as people make it out to be; a little goes a long way. After awhile it starts to make you break out. So I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kateennia

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over a month now and I haven’t noticed that much help with my acne. I was disappointed because it sounded promising. It’s not a bad product, my skin type just might not be right for it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My face always feels super clean and soft when I use it. The only downside, its a tad watery
customer_reviews.author: Lizz Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It cleans my face so nicely and smells so good. It helps when I am having a break out problem. It is also good at cleaning make up off of your face. I absolutely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Girlgonesouth

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for normal to dry skin types
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for normal to dry skin types. I like the scent and feel of this cleanser. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: nice and excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, I use it for facial, the smell is Ok.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Huizar

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Gentle, not harsh but clean feeling. I find that if I use it twice a day it definitely helps control the oil on my face and minimizes breakouts. It’s not cheap but one bottle goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: alp249

customer_reviews.title: A+ product!!! Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with this product. It's smooth and creamy when applied. It doesn't leave a film on my skin after I rinse it off. My skin feels soft and clean after using it. I am so happy that I found something gentle enough for my sensitive skin that's cruelty-free. My face literally feels like a rose petal.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Angus

customer_reviews.title: It smells really nice and is cruelty free which is awesome
customer_reviews.text: It smells really nice and is cruelty free which is awesome, however I have been using it for about three weeks and can not tell much difference. I will say that my skin always feels incredible after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah R

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a clear face
customer_reviews.text: This product is doing amazing things for my hormonal acne. I love that it's all-natural and does the trick. I've been searching for an all-natural product for months without any luck until I found this product. The smell initially takes some getting used, but other than that it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Started using this a few weeks ago and like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Started using this a few weeks ago and like it a lot. I don’t use it daily as I’m afraid it would dry out my skin too much, but maybe once or twice a week. Leaves skin feeling super smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: This is a mild cleaner and not harsh on the skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has a mid scent and is not abrasive. A little goes a long way and leaves my skin feeling refreshed and soft and smooth. My skin feels and looks better after a week.
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: Face feels smooth and clean :)
customer_reviews.text: The seller has always been awesome. I have always liked their products. This product was no exception. I love how clean my face feels when I am done washing it. I will continue to buy this as I need it...
customer_reviews.author: Bridget O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Works well for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Nice smell and seems to work well to help prevent breakouts (I have oily skin). I just wish they made a version of this with some exfoliating beads in it!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: The Tea Tree oil would be good to prevent skin blemishes though
customer_reviews.text: I gave this away because it was a little harsh for my sensitive skin. The Tea Tree oil would be good to prevent skin blemishes though.
customer_reviews.author: Godog

customer_reviews.title: Life changing !!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have suffered with acne for many many years even into adulthood. Not anymore! This product has done wonders for my skin in combination with the moisturizer! I am on my fourth bottle and will continue to order !
customer_reviews.author: nazia castro

customer_reviews.title: Easy on sensitive skin and has a nice fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Use this with the tea tree oil face cream. It wakes up my skin and leaves it feeling moisturized. Easy on sensitive skin and has a nice fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett P. Hasty

customer_reviews.title: Used it for a week and loved it. Smells great and very smooth on your ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a week and loved it. Smells great and very smooth on your skin. However, I started to break out all over my face after a couple weeks. I usually do not break out like that and could not decide if it was the face wash. I stopped using it and a week later my skin cleared up fine. I wanted to really love this face wash but it did not work out on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice to know how much of everything is in it. This product seemed like a dud
customer_reviews.author: LeBlue

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I use this with their face cream
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use this with their face cream. Face is less oily and have a better complexion. I can't say I'm acne free since I've been using this for less than a week. Fingers cross. My expectations were just to have less oil on my face and not have it be so dry at the same time. Defiently worth trying
customer_reviews.author: Tatum Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing on sensitive skin 🙌🏾
customer_reviews.text: A life saver for my sensitive skin. Closes pores and helps heal problem areas without drying skin and damaging it. Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ashley dominque evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love your product! I have only been using it for four days and can already tell a difference. I’ve received so many compliments about my skin glowing. The product is not oily or greasy, which is hard to find these days! Will purchase again! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: aimsnicole

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and thorough cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Great cleanser! I'm a big fan of Tea Tree products & use this with a wash cloth or face sponge to leave my skin feeling clean & soft (smells good, too!) :)
customer_reviews.author: jfree99

customer_reviews.title: Amazing natural face wash!
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is amazing. It makes my face feel wonderful after using it. It also makes me feel good that I’m not putting a bunch of chemicals on my face! I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: not work
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work to my acne at all. The soap turned into solid and it was difficult to use it or take out how much I wanted. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: snow

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Product smells wonderful, doesn't appear to be harsh and is already moisturizing my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lovely clean ingredients. A bit of breakout in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely clean ingredients. A bit of breakout in the beginning. But that’s to be expected when you are purging your skin of toxins .
customer_reviews.author: Delma R. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this face wash even though it is a little on the pricey side. It feels good to be using a product that is organic and has healthy ingredients. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Coffer

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a difference with the first use
customer_reviews.text: Had it a week, I love my results so far! Has been fighting off my time of the month acne as well as the few acne scars I have.
customer_reviews.author: dyt

product_meta.title: Tea Tree Oil Face Cleanser – Face & Body Wash for Dry, Oily, Acne Prone Skin Care & Rosacea 8oz Natural & Organic Facial Wash to Moisturize, Nourish, Soothe Redness & Inflammation 8oz Era-Organics
feature_bullets: Whether You’re Fighting Acne, Oily Skin, Rosacea or Chronic Dry Skin - get healthier, smoother skin! One of the most robust natural facial cleanser formulas on the market.

Don’t Just Wash Your Face & Body – cleanse, soothe and nourish your skin thanks to powerful ingredients your skin will love, including: tea tree oil, goldenseal, burdock root, aloe vera, pomegranate seed oil, st. john’s wort and dandelion root. The perfect face wash for oily skin.

Safe As It Is Effective. Our sulfate free cleanser is made with natural and organic, food-grade ingredients. Wash with confidence without chemicals, toxins, paraben free, perfume free and SLS free. Cruelty free, made in the USA.

Fight pimples, blackheads and breakouts in minutes a day with our gentle tea tree oil face wash for acne. Our moisturizing facial cleanser is made for all skin types to help balance oils, reduce redness, nourish to the base of your skin and help fight acne causing bacteria.
Our acne body wash and face cleansers is made in the USA, cruelty free. As a family owned business, our goal is for you to love your skin again.
